title: Tuna steaks with avocado and red onion salsa
description: This healthy tuna recipe is quick and easy to make – the perfect midweek meal.
ingredients: ½ small red onion, finely sliced
A good squeeze of lime juice
Salsa and lime wedges, to serve

method.Step 1: Chop the avocado and mix with the red onion, Tabasco and lime juice in a bowl. Season.

method.Step 2: Brush the tuna steaks with a mix of soy sauce and olive oil. Griddle for 1-2 minutes each side.

method.Step 3: Serve with the salsa and lime wedges.
